# ChatCompletionResponseMessageAudio

If the audio output modality is requested, this object contains data about the audio response from the model. [Learn more](/docs/guides/audio). 

## Properties

Name | Type | Description | Notes
------------ | ------------- | ------------- | -------------
**id** | **str** | Unique identifier for this audio response. | 
**expires_at** | **int** | The Unix timestamp (in seconds) for when this audio response will no longer be accessible on the server for use in multi-turn conversations.  | 
**data** | **str** | Base64 encoded audio bytes generated by the model, in the format specified in the request.  | 
**transcript** | **str** | Transcript of the audio generated by the model. |
